stripped_text: After you resolve this operation, end your action phase. Look at the top 5 cards of R&D. If any of those cards are agendas, assets, or upgrades, you may install 1 of those cards in a remote server.
text:
After you resolve this operation, end your action phase.
Look at the top 5 cards of R&D. If any of those cards are agendas, assets, or upgrades, you may install 1 of those cards in a remote server.
title: Psychokinesis
